summary: Some Navy warships are nuclear-powered. These ships generate spent fuel—which can pose risks to the environment and human health. The Office of Naval Reactors is building a new facility to manage spent fuel. But the project has been delayed and costs have increased. There have also been quality problems with some of the contractor's work. The contractor did some analysis to determine the causes of...
title: Naval Reactors: Independent Analyses of Cost, Schedule, and Quality of Work Needed for Spent Fuel Handling Facility Project
